i18n/locale.description:
[optional]
Locale to be used in this translation

i18n/tag.description:
[optional]
Which tag to render, default is "span"

i18n/places.description:
[optional after v8.14]
Will be removed in the next major version, use the slot syntax instead

http://kazupon.github.io/vue-i18n/guide/interpolation.html#slots-syntax-usage

i18n-n/value.description:
[required]
Number to be used in formatting

i18n-n/format.description:
[optional]
Number format name or object with explicit format options

i18n-n/locale.description:
[optional]
Locale to be used in this translation

i18n-n/tag.description:
[optional]
Which tag to render, default is `span`
